name: Wishu
slogan: Social marketplace for on-demand local creatives
description:
Wishu is a social marketplace for creative services near you. Connect and collaborate with like-minded creatives, buy and sell from each other.

Browse & Book thousands of on-demand verified talents with portfolios. From designers to makeup artists, from videographers to dancers - we have it all. Wishu accommodates many talents in emerging markets ready to book in a simple and easy process.

Post your portfolio updates to attract more bookings and grow your followers. Post an offer to your profile and start getting bookings. Apply for on-demand tasks and build a reputation. Manage your bookings and earnings in one place.

team.title: Head of Community
team.name: Hubert Trinkunas
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & Head of Growth of Wishu. Former Pres. of Investment & Finance Society.

team.title: CTO
team.name: James Henry Johnson
team.bioHtml: Co-founder of Wishu - CTO & Head of Product, Bachelor in Computer Science, Former Pres. of App Society and Cisco Tech Sales Engineer.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Lavena Xu
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & CEO at Wishu. Previously UK-China Blockchain Association. Board Observer at Baocang International.

jobs.title: Community Growth Hacker
jobs.description:
About Wishu

Wishu is the social marketplace for on-demand creative freelancers. Providing a platform of curated freelancers in creative fields such as Photography, Videography, Beauty, Fashion, Design, Music and Dance, who come together and form an ecosystem of services. Cutting off the traditional middle man, Wishu directly connects creative freelancers to consumers & businesses, making the booking process for buyer and pipeline management for creatives extremely simple. 

You’ll be joining Wishu in its early days to build a cutting-edge platform for creatives. We’re very excited to welcome you onboard! You'll be our first specialist dedicated to work with us to achieve our ambitious growth plans.

Prior experience and familiarity of the creative landscape in London is needed to refine strategic plans with the founding team. Most importantly, you’re enthusiastic about working with creative individuals and know the ins-and-outs of outlining and executing goals and projects. 


Your value & responsibilities

- Build and maintain data-led online and offline campaigns for communities, including acquisition, educational development and retainment of users for Wishu’s community.
- Organic acquisition execution on both supply and demand. To act as the first point of contact for both Wishu’s freelancers and buyers, managing all platform correspondence by building and maintaining user relationships and satisfaction.
- Planning and executing community events, and collaboration with selected partners.
- Organise personalised user feedback sessions, and communicate user feedback to the product team. 
- Plan and execute content for promotional purposes, including blog content and podcast series as educational resources and community stories.
- Design promotional media material for newsletter and social media campaigns. 
- Coordinate with growth marketing team to reflect performances on each campaign.


Must-haves

- 3+ years of experience in the creative industry, worked with or managed creative specialists on projects. 
- Data-driven. Track, measure and reflect on metrics through constant experimentation with campaigns. Be able to present analysis of data to the team.


Desirable

- Event management and coordination
- Experience with Adobe Creative Cloud, including Photoshop, Illustrator, Premier Pro & After Effects


Who we are 

- We're a small team who will work closely with each other. As one of the first hires, your involvement will have a great impact, so if you have an entrepreneurial mind and are excited about creating an ambitious and innovative path for an early stage company, this is for you!

Not to mention we're right next to Spitalfield food market, so your choice of food is unlimited all year round, hands down the most foodie-friendly location to work at!

About Wishu

Providing a platform of curated freelancers in creative fields such as Photography, Videography, Beauty, Fashion, Design, Music and Dance, who come together and form an ecosystem of services.
